metadata.title: CVE-2023-52565 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: media:uvcvideo: Fix OOB read If the index provided by the user is bigger than themask size, we might do an out of bound read.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
